member.summary: Open a data base using a connection string or a dsn file path
member.param: connection string or a dsn file path
true if is a dsn file path under the first parameter

member.name: M:SmartCableVersions.MySqlConnector.GetTable(System.String)
member.summary: Return the table data of given table If the table does not exist will return null
member.param: Name of the table to get data
member.returns: DataTable object containing the requested table data

member.name: M:SmartCableVersions.MySqlConnector.InsertRow(System.String,System.Data.DataRow)
member.summary: Insert a row in the given table

member.name: M:SmartCableVersions.MySqlConnector.GetTable(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Return the table data of given table If the table does not exist will return null Can build a expression with more than one table
member.param: Name of the tables to get data separated by comma
Expression to match commonly used as "collumn_name='key_value'" I.e "ID='1'" will get all the rows that contains the ID equals to 1 Don't forget the ' ' between the key_value in the expression
Specifie a single collumn to get the values or "*" to get all collumns
member.returns: DataTable object containing the requested table data
